ndfs - package ndfs
This package provides common classes, exceptions and interfaces for the NDFS programming assignment.
ndfs() - Method in class ndfs.mcndfs_1_naive.NNDFS
 
NDFS - Interface in ndfs
This interface specifies the way this framework calls an NDFS implementation and the way the result is passed.
ndfs() - Method in interface ndfs.NDFS
This method determines whether or not the graph has an accepting cycle, and returns a boolean indicating the result.
ndfs() - Method in class ndfs.nndfs.NNDFS
 
ndfs.mcndfs_1_naive - package ndfs.mcndfs_1_naive
This package provides a sequential implementation of the Nested Depth-First Search algorithm, as described in Alg.
ndfs.nndfs - package ndfs.nndfs
This package provides a sequential implementation of the Nested Depth-First Search algorithm, as described in Alg.

This factory class is responsible for creating NDFS objects.
